duties_responsibilities.duty: Craft experiences that help tell brands' stories and pave the way for brand storytelling in the future.
Contribute to the sustainment and evolution of digital platforms, concepting creative campaigns, writing scripts, and collaborating with innovation partners.
Leverage brand voice, style guide, and brand identities to build engaging experiences for customers.
Collaborate with creative and art directors, designers, video editors, producers, and project managers.
Effectively communicate and present work to cross-functional partners, and be attentive to detail throughout the project cycle.
Pitch and advocate for concepts with internal and external partners, proofread copy, review client feedback, and make effective edits.
Report to the Copy Director, and meet weekly to brainstorm and strategize.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in English, Advertising, Marketing, or a related field
